entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Lawrence 3:30 PM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Temperature: -1.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 57 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -8.5°C
Wind: W 39 km/h gust 50 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11 except minus 7 along the coast. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 11 except minus 7 along the coast. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain at times heavy or snow. Temperature rising to 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early in the evening. Rain at times heavy beginning in the evening. Rainfall amount 30 mm. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 80 becoming south 70 gusting to 90 except gusting to 110 over exposed areas overnight. Temperature rising to 8 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023
